narrative.narrative: Sol Lineas Aereas is based at Rosario,Argentina and started operations in August 2006. It has a secondary hub at Buenos Aires Jorge Newbery. As of 2015 its fleet consists of Saab 340's. As of November 2014 it was serving 9 domestic destinations besides its hub and focus, one of these was seasonally. It also serves one in Uruguay on a seasonal bases.
